recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.instructions: 1. Boil water in a large pot and cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a separate pan, heat olive oil and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until soft. 3. Add the ground beef and cook until browned. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Add the tomato sauce to the beef mixture and simmer for 10-15 minutes. 5. Drain the spaghetti and toss with the sauce. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Paneer Butter Masala

ingredients.ingredient: Spices (Cumin, Garam Masala, Turmeric) - 1 tsp each

recipe.instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan, sauté the chopped onion until golden brown. 2. Add the ginger-garlic paste and cook until fragrant. 3. Add tomato puree and cook for 5-6 minutes until the oil separates. 4. Add the spices, and cook for another 2 minutes. 5. Add the paneer cubes and mix well. 6. Pour in the heavy cream and cook for 5 minutes on low heat. 7. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with naan or rice.

recipe.name: Chole Bhature

ingredients.ingredient: Spices (Cumin, Garam Masala, Turmeric) - 1 tsp each

recipe.instructions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight and cook until soft. 2. For Bhature dough: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and water. Knead to a smooth dough and let it rest. 3. For Chole gravy: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onion and ginger-garlic paste until golden. 4. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until the oil separates. 5. Add cooked chickpeas to the gravy and cook for 10 minutes. 6. For Bhature: Roll dough into small balls and deep fry in hot oil until golden. 7. Serve the hot Chole with crispy Bhature.

recipe.name: Butter Chicken

ingredients.ingredient: Spices (Garam Masala, Cumin, Chili Powder) - 1 tsp each

recipe.instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan, sauté chopped onion and ginger-garlic paste until golden. 2. Add tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Add chicken pieces, spices, and salt. Cook until chicken is fully cooked. 4. Pour in the cream, cook for another 5-7 minutes on low heat. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve with naan or rice.

recipe.name: Biryani

ingredients.ingredient: Spices (Cumin, Garam Masala, Saffron, Cardamom) - 1 tsp each
Coriander and Mint Leaves - for garnish

recipe.instructions: 1. Cook rice with salt and a few whole spices, and set aside. 2. Marinate the chicken/mutton with yogurt, spices, and salt for 30 minutes. 3. In a pan, heat oil/ghee, sauté onions until golden brown. 4. Add marinated meat, cook until tender. 5. Layer cooked rice over the meat, add saffron-soaked milk on top, and cook on low heat for 15 minutes. 6. Garnish with coriander and mint leaves and serve.

recipe.name: Masoor Dal

ingredients.ingredient: Spices (Cumin, Turmeric, Chili Powder) - 1 tsp each

recipe.instructions: 1. Rinse lentils and cook in water until soft. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until golden. 3. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates. 4. Add the cooked lentils and simmer for 5-7 minutes. 5. Serve hot with rice or roti.
